name: AiTranslationExtension
author: Local
description: Adds API modules and UI helpers for Translate page translation workflows.

AiTranslationExtensionLanguageSidebar.description: Use MediaWiki:Sidebar/<lang> based on the user interface language.

DRUnifiedLangSwitcherEnabled.description: Enable unified language switcher for content + UI languages.

DRUnifiedLangSwitcherNamespaces.description: Namespace IDs where the unified language switcher is enabled.

DRUnifiedLangSwitcherPosition.description: Placement for the unified language switcher: sidebar, header, or personal.

DRUnifiedLangSwitcherFallbackBehavior.description: Behavior when translation is missing: stay_and_notify or navigate_anyway.

DRUnifiedLangSwitcherPreferAvailableOnly.description: Only show languages with existing translation pages.

DRUnifiedLangSwitcherUILanguageMode.description: How to set UI language: uls_cookie or user_preference_only.
